entities.name: bogrod
entities.description: Bogrod is introduced as another goblin who comes scurrying around the counter. He has instructions regarding the vault of Lestrange.

entities.name: travers
entities.description: Travers is standing still with his mouth hanging wide open, indicating that he is under some sort of spell or trance.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is addressed as 'Madam' by Bogrod, indicating her importance and authority in the situation.

entities.name: lestrange
entities.description: Lestrange is mentioned as a family with old clients who wish to visit their vault.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry looks back at Travers and makes a decision regarding what to do next.

entities.name: madam lestrange
entities.description: Madam Lestrange is mentioned as the one who wishes to visit her vault.

relationships.description: Bogrod has instructions regarding the vault of Lestrange.
Hermione is addressed as 'Madam' by Bogrod, indicating her association with Madam Lestrange.
